calibre.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the level of quality or ability that someone or something has achieved
calibre.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The school attracts a high calibre of student.
The paintings were of the highest caliber.
Where will we find another man of his calibre?
The city needs a hotel of this calibre  (=of this high standard).
calibre.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the width of the inside of a gun or tube
